name: Dracule Mihawk
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text:
If your opponent's Leader has the <Slash> attribute, this Leader gains +1000 power.
Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may rest 1 of your cards: If there is a Character with a cost of 5 or more, set up to 3 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, you cannot play Character cards from your hand during this turn.
